main event: A bright white light was observed hovering in the sky near Houtzdale, Pennsylvania on September 16, 1967.
interesting points: The object remained stationary for about 15 minutes, then moved rapidly to the north and then back to its original position. This occurred several times over the next 20 minutes.
The object then moved out of sight.
The witness reported the sighting to Project Blue Book.
No photographs were provided with the report.
The report describes the object as a bright white light, but does not provide any other physical details.
